title: PBE signups Back
body:
Please riot let us sing up for the pbe i have been waiting too do so for freaking 10 months and i still cant sing up Riot pls fix it i wanna sign up and of course i wanna get accepted but thats up too you.
Ps. I love you if you accept me xD.

replies.body: The PBE signup page is down for maintenance per the [PBE Status Page](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe).  It won't be possible to signup or create an account until upgrades are complete.  Hang tight for now, and good luck!
pls dont take this too serious i just want riot to fix it
